message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the application of linear network coding to wireless broadcast, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the performance of different coding techniques, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SI). The paper uses mathematical analysis and optimization techniques, which are common in the field of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). Finally, the paper proposes a novel coding technique based on a hypergraph model, which could be considered as a machine learning approach (cs.LG).
